attributes.title: why. just why.
attributes.review: Why do you consider banning TikTok in the US? So many people I mean SO MANY PEOPLE are in love with this app and have so much fun with it! It helps us get through quarantine and what not. So in my opinion this is a horrible idea and you should crush people’s dreams. So thanks for reading this. Hope your having a great day ☺️

attributes.title: BUGGED

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.review: This app took A WEEK to download!! It started sending cats to my house and set off my fire alarm! Also the whole app is a SCAM!!! The Chinese government sent emails to my phone and HACKED it! Not to mention that it made my oven CUSS ME OUT!! The app is also a cyber bully and it told my microwave to kill it self and sadly my microwave DID kill it self so now I HAVE NO MICROWAVE!!! And for some reason it told the Germany Policemen to come to my door and ask questions but I didn’t understand a word they said and they TOOK my dog and didn’t give him back until 2 days later. So I do not recommend this app at all!!!!

attributes.title: Try to eat me
